faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I schedule a car viewing?
faq.a1: You can schedule a car viewing through our website or by calling our customer service hotline. We will arrange a professional sales consultant to serve you based on your schedule.
faq.a2: Yes, we cooperate with multiple banks and financial institutions to provide flexible financing options. Please consult our sales consultants for details.
faq.q3: Do the vehicles come with a warranty?
faq.a3: All our vehicles come with at least a 3-month basic warranty, and you can choose to extend the warranty period. Specific warranty policies may vary depending on the vehicle condition.
faq.q4: Can I trade in my old car?
faq.a4: Yes, we offer trade-in services. Our appraisers will professionally evaluate your vehicle and offer a reasonable trade-in price.
